channel.title: elasticsearch on uyaba的博客
channel.description: Recent content in elasticsearch on uyaba的博客

item.title: ELasticSearch设置ik+pinyin分词器
item.description: 安装 假设你已经使用docker安装了es集群 1 $ cd ${docker-compose-file-dir} 安装ik插件 1 $ docker-compose exec es01 elasticsearch-plugin install https://github.com/medcl/elasticsearch-analysis-ik/releases/download/v7.6.0/elasticsearch-analysis-ik-7.6.0.zip 安装pinyin插件 1 $ docker-compose exec es01 elasticsearch-plugin install https://github.com/medcl/elasticsearch-analysis-pinyin/releases/download/v7.6.0/elasticsearch-analysis-pinyin-7.6.0.zip 重启docker 1 $ docker-compose restart
